name: Robert Green
text: Ordered the stuffed Howie bread and a lg pizza. Had it delivered the delivery person was nice but once I open the box with the stuffed bread you could see it was burnt. My question is how do you send that out to someone. And the pizza was â€¦More

Very professional and courteous staff.

name: Daniel Popham Jr.
text: The pizza is always good. Also their salad and Howie bread was good as well. However their boneless wings were more like chicken nuggets than wings they were not very appetising.

text: 20 minutes late for over cooked pizza when I ordered 3 hours early. I'll never be back

name: Jamin White
text: The meatball sandwich was PHENOMENAL!  Never been disappointed with any HH I've ordered from.  Wish there were locations around my hometown of St. Louis, Mo!

text: Good pizza

name: Michael Stogsdill
text: Best chain pizza joint in town. They often have deals, if you check out the app.

name: Jacob Schwan
text: Love Howie's!  We don't have one very close to us in Ohio.  The guy at the counter was super friendly!

text: My deep dish pizza was over cooked.  The deep dish crazy bread was over cooked.  This was the worst pizza take out I have ever had.  Just awful!!

text: Spent $86 dollars on an order while I was in town forgot things and the wings had maybe a teaspoon of sauce on them. Called to have it credited and they told me no. They couldn't credit only the specific amount. I said I wasn't coming back â€¦More
